emergence.strategy.astar

Class AStar

  • java.lang.Object
    • emergence.strategy.astar.AStar

  • public class AStar
extends java.lang.Object
    This AStar algorithm finds the shortest path to a given target.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AStar(core.game.StateObservation stateObs, AHeuristic heuristic)
      Creates a AStar object given the state observation and a heuristic.
      AStar(core.game.StateObservation stateObs, AHeuristic heuristic, int maxStates)
      Creates a AStar object given the state observation, the heuristic, and the maximum number of states in the openlist.
      AStar(core.game.StateObservation stateObs, ATarget target)
      Creates a AStar object given a state observation and a target by calling another Constructor of this class.
      AStar(core.game.StateObservation stateObs, ATarget target, int maxStates)
      Creates a AStar object given the state observation, the target, and the maximum number of states in the openlist.
      AStar(core.game.StateObservation stateObs, ATarget target, int maxStates, ASafety safetyStrategy)
      Creates a AStar object given the state observation and a target and allows to specify the maximum number of states which are stored in the openlist and a safetystrategy.

      This is the core method of the AStar algorithm.

      Returns the actual openlist.

      Returns true if the algorithm has found a path, false otherwise.
      boolean isNotReachable()
      Returns true if the astar algorithm does not find a solution, false otherwise.

      Prints debug information in the displayed window
      void printOpenList()
      Prints the nodes in the openlist.

      Returns the parameters, used for csv output.

    • Method Detail

      • expand

        public AStarNode expand()
        This is the core method of the AStar algorithm. Every step is expanding one node depending on one actions. If of one node all the actions are expanded, the new best node of the open list is taken.
        Returns:
        the node that was expanded or null if we found the winning node or it's not reachable.

      • printOpenList

        public void printOpenList()
        Prints the nodes in the openlist.

        Returns the actual openlist.

        public boolean isNotReachable()
        Returns true if the astar algorithm does not find a solution, false otherwise.

        public boolean hasFound()
        Returns true if the algorithm has found a path, false otherwise.
